news.title: Starmer announces U-turn on winter fuel payment cuts
news.summary: The move follows political pressure in recent weeks after Labour losses at England's local elections.

news.title: US accepts gifted Qatari plane to join Air Force One fleet
news.summary: The White House insists that the gift is legal, but some of Trump's biggest backers have criticised the deal.

news.title: Is the government meeting its pledges on illegal immigration and asylum?
news.summary: BBC Verify examines key areas which the government has promised to make improvements

news.title: Clownfish surprise scientists by shrinking to cope with ocean heat
news.summary: Fish made famous by the movie Finding Nemo are shrinking to cope with marine heatwaves.

news.title: Jay Slater's mum pleads for witnesses to attend inquest into his death in Tenerife
news.summary: A coroner investigating the teenager's death said renewed efforts would be made to find witnesses.

news.title: Low chance tornado could hit UK as rain forecast for bank holiday weekend
news.summary: Forecasters say the chance of a tornado on Wednesday is extremely low and a warning has not been issued.

news.title: Israel's Eurovision result prompts questions over voting system
news.summary: Countries including Spain, Ireland and Finland raise concerns about the song contest's public vote.

news.title: National parking platform seeks to end 'hassle' of multiple parking apps
news.summary: The frustration of having to download multiple apps to pay for parking may go if a new platform is widely adopted.

news.title: Mark Gordon blames baby's death on police manhunt, court hears
news.summary: Gordon, 50, gives evidence for the first time in his retrial over the death of his newborn daughter.

news.title: Gaza health system 'stretched beyond breaking point' by Israeli offensive, WHO warns
news.summary: The UN agency says Israeli ground operations and evacuation orders are putting hospitals out of service or making them inaccessible.
